examples.translation: If I wear a mask, do I still need to apply sunscreen?

examples.chinese: 防曬四季都不能偷懶，特別是夏天紫外線強，更要做好萬全準備！
examples.translation: You can't slack off on sun protection all year round, especially in summer when UV rays are strong - you need to be fully prepared!
Remember to apply sunscreen before going out.
